wring.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to succeed in getting something from someone, but only after a lot of effort
wring.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They are always trying to wring additional funds from the government.
I managed to wring the information out of him.
wring.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to tightly twist a wet cloth or wet clothes in order to remove water
